Verify the modal background overlay has opacity 0.5 and background color rgba(0,0,0,0.8)
Verify the 'Cancel' button has border 1px solid #6c757d
Click the 'Confirm' button
Verify the 'Confirm' button becomes active and changes background color to #0056b3
Open 'https://demo.app/search'
Verify the search input field is focused upon page load
Verify the search input field's placeholder text is 'Search for products, categories...' and text color is #6c757d
Verify the 'Search' button has a background color #007bff and border radius 5px
Verify the search results count is displayed as '12 results found'
Verify each search result item has a min-height 100px and max-height 150px
Verify the 'Sort By' dropdown has 'Relevance' selected
Verify the 'Price Range' slider has a current value of '0 - 500'
Verify the 'Clear Filters' button is only visible when filters are applied
Verify results are displayed in a flex layout with row-gap 10px
Open 'https://demo.app/about'
Verify the 'About Us' heading is displayed with font family 'Georgia' and color #333333
Verify the main content paragraph has font size 16px and line height 1.8
Verify the 'Learn More' link is present, navigates to 'https://demo.app/about/more', and has text-decoration underline
Verify the hero image 'about_hero.jpg' is loaded, width 100%, and has a filter brightness(90%)
Verify the team member cards have a box-shadow 0 2px 5px rgba(0,0,0,0.1)
Verify each team member's name has font weight 700
Verify the 'Contact Us' button is positioned at (100, 500) and clickable
Verify the page footer is fixed at bottom
Simulate a mobile viewport of 360px width for 'https://demo.app/product/456'
Verify the hamburger menu icon is visible, x coordinate 10px, y coordinate 10px
Verify the main navigation links are hidden (display none)
Verify the product image has a max-width 95% and height auto
Verify the product description text size is 14px
Verify the 'Add to Cart' button occupies 100% width, height 50px, and is fixed at the bottom of the screen
Verify the quantity selector has a min-width 40px
Verify the product price is displayed at top 120px, left 10px
Verify no horizontal overflow (overflow-x hidden)
Verify the header remains sticky during a scroll action
Open 'https://demo.app/form'
Trigger an error state
Verify the error message container is visible with background color #f8d7da and border color #f5c6cb
Verify the error text 'Invalid input provided.' is displayed with color #721c24 and font weight 500
Verify the specific input field 'Email' has border 2px solid #dc3545
Verify the error icon 'error_icon.svg' is loaded, rendered dimensions 24x24px, and has a 'stroke' color #dc3545
Verify the retry button 'Try Again' is enabled and has a transition for its background color of 0.2s ease
Verify the form's submit button is disabled
Verify the error message appears within 500ms after invalid submission
Verify the page title reflects 'Error Page'
Open 'https://demo.app/dashboard/settings'
Verify the 'General' tab is active, has background color #ffffff, and font weight 700
Verify the 'Security' tab is clickable and has text color #007bff
Verify the content area for the active tab has padding 20px
Verify the tab switcher bar has border-bottom 1px solid #dee2e6
Verify the 'Appearance' tab content area has min-height 300px
Click on the 'Integrations' tab
Verify the 'Integrations' tab becomes active and its content visible
Verify the 'Integrations' tab content loads within 800ms
Verify the tab labels have word-spacing 1px
Verify the tab container has a box-sizing border-box
Verify the horizontal scroll for tabs is active (overflow-x scroll) if needed
